R

resetBallProportions() - Method in class model.GameState
Resets the ball's position to the center of the game area, ensuring it starts in a neutral location at the beginning of the game or after a score.
resetBallSpeed(int) - Method in class controller.GameController
Resets the ball's speed to a specified value.
resetGameState(int) - Method in class controller.GameController
Resets the game state to the start of a round.
resetPaddleProportions() - Method in class model.GameState
Resets the paddle positions based on the current game area dimensions, ensuring they are proportionally placed within the play area.
Resizable - Interface in model
Provides an interface for game elements that can be resized along the X and Y axes.
resizeX(double) - Method in class model.Ball
Resizes the ball along the X axis by a specified factor, adjusting both its position and radius.
resizeX(double) - Method in class model.GameState
Resizes all game elements along the X axis by a specified factor.
resizeX(double) - Method in class model.Paddle
Resizes the paddle along the X axis by a specified factor.
resizeX(double) - Method in interface model.Resizable
Resizes the object along the X axis based on the provided scaling factor.
resizeY(double) - Method in class model.Ball
Resizes the ball along the Y axis by a specified factor, adjusting both its position and radius.
resizeY(double) - Method in class model.GameState
Resizes all game elements along the Y axis by a specified factor.
resizeY(double) - Method in class model.Paddle
Resizes the paddle along the Y axis by a specified factor.
resizeY(double) - Method in interface model.Resizable
Resizes the object along the Y axis based on the provided scaling factor.
resume() - Method in class controller.BallManager
Resumes the ball's movement by setting the running flag to true.
run() - Method in class controller.BallManager
The entry point for the ball movement thread.
